description: Allows or restricts mirroring network services. By default, Amazon DNS network services are not eligible for Traffic Mirror. Use AddNetworkServices to add network services to a Traffic Mirror filter. When a network service is added to the Traffic Mirror filter, all traffic related to that network service will be mirrored. When you no longer want to mirror network services, use RemoveNetworkServices to remove the network services from the Traffic Mirror filter.

parameters.name: TrafficMirrorFilterId
parameters.description: The ID of the Traffic Mirror filter.

parameters.name: AddNetworkServices
parameters.description: The network service, for example Amazon DNS, that you want to mirror. (string) ---

parameters.name: RemoveNetworkServices
parameters.description: The network service, for example Amazon DNS, that you no longer want to mirror. (string) ---

nested_items.name: TrafficMirrorFilter
nested_items.description: The Traffic Mirror filter that the network service is associated with.

nested_items.name: TrafficMirrorFilterId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Traffic Mirror filter.

nested_items.name: IngressFilterRules
nested_items.description: Information about the ingress rules that are associated with the Traffic Mirror filter.

nested_items.name: TrafficMirrorFilterRuleId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: TrafficMirrorFilterId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Traffic Mirror filter that the rule is associated with.

nested_items.name: TrafficDirection
nested_items.description: The traffic direction assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: RuleNumber
nested_items.description: The rule number of the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: RuleAction
nested_items.description: The action assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: Protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: DestinationPortRange
nested_items.description: The destination port range assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: FromPort
nested_items.description: The start of the Traffic Mirror port range. This applies to the TCP and UDP protocols.

nested_items.name: ToPort
nested_items.description: The end of the Traffic Mirror port range. This applies to the TCP and UDP protocols.

nested_items.name: SourcePortRange
nested_items.description: The source port range assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: FromPort
nested_items.description: The start of the Traffic Mirror port range. This applies to the TCP and UDP protocols.

nested_items.name: ToPort
nested_items.description: The end of the Traffic Mirror port range. This applies to the TCP and UDP protocols.

nested_items.name: DestinationCidrBlock
nested_items.description: The destination CIDR block assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: SourceCidrBlock
nested_items.description: The source CIDR block assigned to the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the Traffic Mirror rule.

nested_items.description: Tags on Traffic Mirroring filter rules.
